definition: harmonious/to adjust/to tune (e.g. wireless receiver)/to bring into harmony
to harmonize/to reconcile/to blend/to suit well/to adjust/to regulate/to season (food)/to provoke/to incite
to transfer/to move (troops or cadres)/to investigate/to enquire into/accent/view/argument/key (in music)/mode (music)/tune/tone/melody

sentences.english: Video recording or reproducing apparatus, whether or not incorporating a video tuner.
sentences.chinese: 視頻信號錄製或重放設備，不論是否裝有高頻調諧器。

sentences.english: The radio's dial twirled and the lights behind the tuning panel went out.
sentences.chinese: 收音機的調諧鈕轉動了一下，面板上的指示燈熄滅了。

sentences.english: The first all-solid state tunable laser system has been developed successfully.
sentences.chinese: 第一臺全固化可調諧激光系統已研製成功。

sentences.english: You can attune unto our kingdoms to learn the Language of ONE.
sentences.chinese: 你能向我們王國調諧來學習全一之語。

sentences.english: This laser design allows for broadband tuning.
sentences.chinese: 這種激光器允許激光的多頻率調諧。

sentences.english: Sodium atoms in flame can be resonantly excited by pulsed tunable dye laser.
sentences.chinese: 用脈衝可調諧染料激光共振激勵火焰中的鈉原子。

sentences.english: Both public and private EMON counters may be used for software and hardware tuning.
sentences.chinese: 公用和私用EMON計數器都可用於軟件和硬件調諧。

sentences.english: The excitation source was a flashlamp pumped rhodamine tunable dye laser .
sentences.chinese: 激發源爲閃光燈泵可調諧若丹明染科雷射器。

sentences.english: Fine tunning the already coded plug-in to make it works perfect.
sentences.chinese: 精細調諧已經編碼插件，使其作品的完美。

sentences.english: An all fiber wavelength tunable loop mirror is demonstrated.
sentences.chinese: 介紹了一種全光纖波長可調諧環路反射鏡。

sentences.english: The tunability of millimeter wave free electron laser was observed.
sentences.chinese: 觀察到了毫米波自由電子激光器的調諧特性。

sentences.english: Ensure that control valves have been left in normal operating position and properly configured on pcs.
sentences.chinese: 在工作狀態，把調諧器調整到在一個方便的位置。

sentences.english: The flow chart to complete the automatic tuning function is given in the paper.
sentences.chinese: 並給出了實現整個自動調諧功能的程序流程圖。

sentences.english: It make tuning screw small in body, reasonable in structure to the engineering.
sentences.chinese: 設計出空間尺寸小，結構合理的調諧螺釘應用於工程。

sentences.english: Meditation is the attuning of the mental and physical body to your spiritual source.
sentences.chinese: 冥想是將你的身心調諧至你精神的來源。

sentences.english: The isochromatic principle of birefringent filter design is proposed in this paper.
sentences.chinese: 提出雙折射調諧器設計的等色圖方法，給出原理。
